appetizers.name: Garlic Bread
appetizers.description: Freshly baked garlic bread with a hint of herbs.

appetizers.name: Caesar Salad
appetizers.description: Romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

appetizers.name: Spring Rolls
appetizers.description: Crispy vegetable spring rolls served with sweet chili sauce.

appetizers.name: Chicken Wings
appetizers.description: Spicy chicken wings served with blue cheese dressing.

appetizers.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
appetizers.description: Creamy spinach and artichoke dip served with tortilla chips.

appetizers.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
appetizers.description: Mushroom caps filled with a savory blend of cream cheese and herbs.

appetizers.name: Garlic Shrimp
appetizers.description: Sauteed shrimp in garlic butter, served with toasted baguette slices.

main_courses.name: Grilled Salmon
main_courses.description: Grilled salmon fillet served with lemon butter sauce and seasonal vegetables.

main_courses.name: Chicken Alfredo
main_courses.description: Creamy Alfredo sauce tossed with fettuccine and grilled chicken.

main_courses.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
main_courses.description: Assorted vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce served over steamed rice.

main_courses.name: Cheeseburger(with a side of fries)
main_courses.description: Juicy beef patty topped with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

main_courses.name: Ribeye Steak
main_courses.description: Juicy ribeye steak cooked to your preference, served with mashed potatoes.

main_courses.name: Chicken Parmesan
main_courses.description: Breaded chicken topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella.

main_courses.name: New York Strip Steak
main_courses.description: Juicy New York strip steak cooked to your preference.

main_courses.name: Eggplant Parmesan
main_courses.description: Breaded eggplant topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella.

desserts.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
desserts.description: Rich chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

desserts.name: Tiramisu
desserts.description: Classic Italian dessert made with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

desserts.name: Fruit Sorbet
desserts.description: Refreshing fruit sorbet in various flavors.

desserts.name: Chocolate Brownie
desserts.description: Rich chocolate brownie served with vanilla ice cream.

desserts.name: New York Cheesecake
desserts.description: Creamy New York-style cheesecake topped with fresh strawberries.

desserts.name: Fruit Tart
desserts.description: Butter pastry shell filled with custard and topped with fresh seasonal fruits.

beverages.name: Iced Tea
beverages.description: Refreshing iced tea with a choice of flavors.

beverages.name: Freshly Brewed Coffee
beverages.description: A cup of freshly brewed coffee.

beverages.name: Fruit Smoothie
beverages.description: Refreshing blend of fresh fruits and yogurt.

beverages.name: Cappuccino
beverages.description: Espresso mixed with equal parts of steamed milk and milk foam.

beverages.name: Fresh Orange Juice
beverages.description: Squeezed from ripe oranges, served chilled.

beverages.name: Lemonade
beverages.description: Classic lemonade made with freshly squeezed lemons and a touch of sweetness.

breakfast.name: Pancakes
breakfast.description: Delicious fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup.

breakfast.name: Eggs Benedict
breakfast.description: Poached eggs served on an English muffin with hollandaise sauce.

breakfast.name: French Toast
breakfast.description: Thick slices of bread soaked in a mixture of eggs and milk, then fried until golden brown.

breakfast.name: Chicken Fajita Omelette
breakfast.description: Fluffy omelette with your choice of fillings: cheese, ham, peppers, onions, etc.

breakfast.name: Belgian Waffles
breakfast.description: Golden-brown Belgian waffles served with fresh strawberries and whipped cream.

breakfast.name: Healthy Breakfast Bowl
breakfast.description: Quinoa, avocado, cherry tomatoes, spinach, and a poached egg topped with sesame seeds.

breakfast.name: Smoked Salmon Bagel
breakfast.description: Toasted bagel with cream cheese, smoked salmon, capers, red onions, and dill.
